name: N0-EXIT
description: The game tells the story of a miner who was trapped in an iron mine after a strong earthquake , now he fights contro many monsters to survive and find a way out .
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 1.2 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Resolução de 1280x720(HD)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 2.0 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 gb video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Resolução de 1280x720(HD)
